summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate the functionality of swapping exponential moving average (EMA) weights in TensorFlow models, covering standard operation, epoch‑based swapping, handling of unsupported optimizers, interaction with loss‑scale optimizers, and behavior under distributed training strategies.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of EMA weight swapping mechanisms to support stable model training, optimization, and deployment in production machine‑learning pipelines.
